sections.paragraph: + Grandson of the patriarch Asher, (Genesis 46:17; Numbers 26:45; 1 Chronicles 7:31) from whom came the Heberites. (Numbers 26:45) + The patriarch Eber. (Luke 3:35) [[603]Eber] + The father of Socho; a Judite. (1 Chronicles 4:18) + A Benjamite. (1 Chronicles 8:17) + A Benjamite. (1 Chronicles 8:22) + A Gadite. (1 Chronicles 5:13) + The husband of Jael, who slew Sisera by driving a nail into his temple. (Judges 4:21,22)
